title: B-flat major sight-singing - bass, compound, chrom

content.question: Look over the melody and begin practicing. You have 75 seconds to practice. This is the starting pitch of the printed melody. Press record to begin your performance.

frqParts.text: Look over the melody and begin practicing. You have 75 seconds to practice. This is the starting pitch of the printed melody. Press record to begin your performance.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to sing the pitches and rhythms of a notated melody (melody may be in treble or bass clef, in a major or minor key, or in simple or compound meter, and it may include chromatically altered pitches).
